step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arms overhead and fingers open. Keep this position for the next step.
You're making a fist and pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you do this.
You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Remember to relax your muscles during this phase.
You're repeating the movement. Focus on maintaining an open hand and a relaxed posture when stretching overhead.
You're completing the repetitions. Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead and your fingers are spread wide.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and arms stretched overhead. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together when you push down.
